title_en: AutoMV: An Automatic Multi-Agent System for Music Video Generation
title_zh: AutoMV：一种用于音乐视频生成的自动多智能体系统
summary_en: Music-to-Video (M2V) generation for full-length songs faces significant challenges. Existing methods produce short, disjointed clips, failing to align visuals with musical structure, beats, or lyrics, and lack temporal consistency. We propose AutoMV, a multi-agent system that generates full music videos (MVs) directly from a song. AutoMV first applies music processing tools to extract musical attributes, such as structure, vocal tracks, and time-aligned lyrics, and constructs these features as contextual inputs for following agents. The screenwriter Agent and director Agent then use this information to design short script, define character profiles in a shared external bank, and specify camera instructions. Subsequently, these agents call the image generator for keyframes and different video generators for "story" or "singer" scenes. A Verifier Agent evaluates their output, enabling multi-agent collaboration to produce a coherent longform MV. To evaluate M2V generation, we further propose a benchmark with four high-level categories (Music Content, Technical, Post-production, Art) and twelve ine-grained criteria. This benchmark was applied to compare commercial products, AutoMV, and human-directed MVs with expert human raters: AutoMV outperforms current baselines significantly across all four categories, narrowing the gap to professional MVs. Finally, we investigate using large multimodal models as automatic MV judges; while promising, they still lag behind human expert, highlighting room for future work.
summary_zh: 为完整歌曲生成音乐到视频（M2V）面临着重大挑战。现有方法只能生成简短、不连贯的片段，无法使视觉内容与音乐结构、节拍或歌词对齐，并且缺乏时间一致性。我们提出了AutoMV，这是一个能够直接从歌曲生成完整音乐视频（MV）的多智能体系统。AutoMV首先应用音乐处理工具提取音乐属性，如结构、人声音轨和时间对齐的歌词，并将这些特征构建为后续智能体的上下文输入。随后，编剧智能体和导演智能体利用这些信息设计简短脚本、在共享的外部库中定义角色档案，并指定镜头指令。接着，这些智能体调用图像生成器生成关键帧，并调用不同的视频生成器来制作“故事”或“歌手”场景。一个验证器智能体评估它们的输出，通过多智能体协作生成一部连贯的长篇MV。为了评估M2V生成，我们进一步提出了一个包含四个高级类别（音乐内容、技术、后期制作、艺术）和十二项细粒度标准的基准。应用该基准，由专家评分员对商业产品、AutoMV以及人工执导的MV进行了比较：AutoMV在所有四个类别上均显著优于当前基线，缩小了与专业MV的差距。最后，我们探索了使用大型多模态模型作为自动MV评判者的可能性；尽管前景可观，但其表现仍落后于人类专家，这凸显了未来工作的改进空间。
